Articles.Content:
(I already posted this in the repository, but I might as well make a new thread for a flying wing craft file)

The X-47B (Will be updated with the infinitidice tailhook when available)

https://www.dropbox.com/s/f08w0wq3vu0k5cv/X-47B.craft

This marvel of flying wing engineering has two enclosed weapons bays and will very much sneak into enemy territory with an enclosed turbofan engine to rain death upon the enemy. It must also be landed at around 20 m/s for carrier landings until the tailhook is released. it requires Traveros pizza and aerospace, dammed robotics (maybe so) , novapunch, and the realistic airplane wings parts pack with the fix for greater realistic lift on the mod's wings along with the lazor missiles package mod and the lazor mod (maybe so).

Check for more updates to this craft and post.

Edited November 1, 2013 by andrew123
